rules.natural: If artwork2 meets the security condition, then the exhibition is ready.
Artwork2 is damaged or, assuming it is insured, it can be exhibited.
Whenever sculpture1 meets the transport condition, it is packaged.
If sculpture1 is packaged, then artwork2 is not damaged.
